name: Rocket Pawtrol
description:
The animals have broken into the intergalactic rocket factory and are escaping! Use capture pods to safely capture the animals and prevent them from flying out into uncertain doom.

This is a modded version of the Rocket Patrol game (1978) released for the APF MP-1000 System, remade in the Phaser 3 framework for a class project.

Artwork (except starfield) by me

Sound Design (SFX + BGM) by me
